title: How Does Ip distritbution work?
body:
Some of my matches I do really well and I only earn like 80+ip however some matches I do average but I earn like 200+ip

how does this ip distribtuion work extactly?

replies.body:
When you win your first game of the day (22 hour cooldown between wins) you get 150 bonus IP.

Additionally, sometimes Riot gives out IP boosts for various reasons (it'll be visible in the top right of the client when you're not in a game). 

Apart from the bonus IP factors I just outlined, there's 3 factors that influence IP gains:

1. The end result (win or loss)
2. The length of the game (you gain/lose more IP based on the length of the game)
3. The game mode you play (ARAM gives less IP than summoner's rift, bot games give less IP than ARAM or SR), custom games give even less

I had a game where I went 7/3/6 as{{champion:79}} with 29:49 time of gameplay and earned 235 ip

I had a game where I went  16/5/3 as{{champion:238}}with 43:32 time of gameplay and earned 117 ip.

Obviously i did better with zed and had a longer gameplay but I earned less ip.
The biggest factors are game length and end result (W/L).
